query:
SELECT 
                field_id,
                COALESCE(
                    to_jsonb(value_text),
                    to_jsonb(value_integer),
                    to_jsonb(value_decimal),
                    to_jsonb(value_boolean),
                    to_jsonb(value_date),
                    to_jsonb(value_datetime),
                    value_json
                ) as value
            FROM listing_field_values
            WHERE listing_id = $1
